name: Photon PUN2 - FPS Multiplayer
description:
Multiplayer FPS Template (Photon  PUN2 Version) offers everything you need to create your own ultimate Multiplayer PVP First Person Shooter in Unity.

COMING SOON at Unity Asset store !
Developer's note: Once the game had entered the beta stage, this alpha version became outdated as it did not contain all the updates that the game has received, which could compromise the player's experience.
Status: In development
